overview: David Hall is a senior level sales and marketing executive with over 13 years experience working with fortune 500 companies. .David is widely recognized as a leading name in the sales and marketing field locally and nationally. As company spokesman David was largely responsible for establishing Rock Financial as Michigan’s most recognizable company. Over the past 5 years David has been recognized in 2006 in Crains Business Magazine’s coveted ‘40 under 40’ list as well as awarded ‘Speaker of the Year’ by Michigan Meetings and Events Magazine. He was also nominated by Boy Scouts of America as ‘Businessman of the Year’ and spearheaded the ‘Read to Achieve’ program in conjunction with the NBA’s Detroit Pistons. Between 1997-2002 David was cited in many mortgage banking publications as one of the top ten mortgage bankers in the nation (3 times) and consistently placed in the top 50 each year.
